revision.text:
'''[[Cape Breton Island]]''' is an island in the Canadian province of Nova Scotia, in Canada.
'''Cape Breton''' may also refer to:<!--N.B. "Cape Breton" normally refers to Cape Breton Island and other, smaller islands in Cape Breton, Richmond, Inverness, and Victoria Counties in Nova Scotia, but the primary topic is [[Cape Breton Island]] since that's where [[Cape Breton]] lands-->
{{TOC right}} ==Places== * [[Cape Breton (Nova Scotia)]], a cape at the eastern tip of Cape Breton Island, Canada * [[Cape Breton (electoral district)]] * [[Cape Breton (provincial electoral district)]] * [[Cape Breton Highlands]], a mountain range in the north of Cape Breton Island, Canada * [[Cape Breton Regional Municipality]], a regional municipality in Nova Scotia
==Ships== * [[HMCS Cape Breton (K350)|HMCS ''Cape Breton'' (K350)]], a River-class frigate launched in 1942 * [[HMCS Cape Breton (ARE 100)|HMCS ''Cape Breton'' (ARE 100)]], a Cape-class maintenance ship built in 1944, in Canadian service from 1953
==Sports teams== * [[Cape Breton Breakers]], a former team of the defunct National Basketball League * [[Cape Breton Crush]], a former team of the defunct Canadian Elite Hockey League * [[Cape Breton Oilers]], a former team of the American Hockey League * [[Cape Breton Screaming Eagles]], a team in the Quebec Major Junior Hockey League
==Other uses== * [[Cape Breton Development Corporation]] * [[Cape Breton University]]
==See also== * [[Capbreton]] or Cap Berton, a commune of the Landes département in southwestern France * [[Cape Breton accent]] * [[Cape Breton and Central Nova Scotia Railway]] * [[Cape Breton—Canso]] * [[Cape Breton fiddling]] * [[Cape Breton Highlands National Park]] * [[Cape Breton Labour Party]] * [[Cape Breton North and Victoria]] * [[Cape Breton Nova]] * ''[[Cape Breton Post]]'' * [[Cape Breton South (federal electoral district)]] * [[Cape Breton South (provincial electoral district)]] * [[Enterprise Cape Breton Corporation]] * [[Province of Cape Breton Island]], a political movement
{{disambiguation|geo|ship}}
